info.title: QuickCredit API
info.description: QuickCredit is an online lending platform.

get.description: It retrieves a list of all users

application/json.message: Record of all users retrieved successfully!

get.description:
Admin can view a specific user
params:email

patch.description:
Admin can mark a user as verified
PATCH /users/:email/verify

get.description:
Admin can view all loans
GET /loans
It retrieves a specific loan record using the unique loan-id

patch.description: Admin can approve or reject a loan application
patch.summary: Approve or reject a loan application

post.description: It creates a loan repayment record for a specific loan.

get.description: It retrieves the loan repayment history of a specific loan.
